name: Mercure Johannesburg Randburg

reviews.text: The hotel Mercure Randburg was everything I wanted it to be. Clean, modern, helpful and good location.
reviews.title: A very good choice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived there at 7am and were thankfully allowed into our room. What bliss after 24 hours since leaving our home in Paris!
reviews.title: A Mercure Experience

likes.liked: — Being central to everthing we needed to do

reviews.text: The staff were very helpful, helped to arrange a city tour with a local guide (well worth it if you have an afternoon to kill) and we could leave the bulk of our luggage secure in a locked room for the four days that we left to go on safari.
reviews.title: Good value for money

description: On the outskirts, facing the new shopping center Brightwater Commons, previously known as the Randburg Waterfront shopping & entertainment centre. 30 min from Jo'burg international airport, 104 air conditioned rooms, breakfast restaurant, bar, 2 conference rooms, secure parking and 24h security.
